faqs.question: what are your account types
faqs.answer: We offer Savings Accounts, Current Accounts, Fixed Deposits and Recurring Deposits.

faqs.question: how to open account
faqs.answer: You can open an account by visiting our nearest branch with valid ID and address proof, or you may apply online through our portal.

faqs.question: savings account interest rate
faqs.answer: Our current savings account interest rate is 3.5% per annum. Please note interest rates are subject to change â€” check latest updates on website or nearest branch.

faqs.question: nearest branch address
faqs.answer: Please visit our branch locator page or provide your city/pincode so we can guide you to the nearest branch.

faqs.question: loan interest rate
faqs.answer: Loan interest rates depend on loan type, tenure and credit history. Please contact our customer support or visit the loan calculator page.

faqs.question: hello
faqs.answer: Hello! Welcome to BankXYZ. How can I help you today?

faqs.question: bye
faqs.answer: Goodbye! Thank you for choosing BankXYZ. Have a nice day!
